code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Post=_ref=>{let{content,author,onLike,onComment}=_ref;const[comments,setComments]=useState([]);const[commentInput,setCommentInput]=useState('');const handleCommentSubmit=()=>{if(commentInput){setComments([...comments,commentInput]);onComment(commentInput);setCommentInput('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:author}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onLike,children:"Like"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:commentInput,onChange:e=>setCommentInput(e.target.value),placeholder:"Add a comment..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCommentSubmit,children:"Comment"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"comments",children:comments.map((comment,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"comment",children:comment},index))})]});};export default Post;
